verbs.description: demerge (third-person singular simple present demerges, present participle demerging, simple past and past participle demerged)

entries.meaning: (business) To separate companies that were formerly combined; to reverse a merger.

verbs.description: demerge (third-person singular simple present demerges, present participle demerging, simple past and past participle demerged)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) To plunge down into; to sink; to immerse.
examples: The water in which it was demerged. — Boyle.
